definitions.text: an acute viral disease of the nervous system of warm-blooded animals (usually transmitted by the bite of a rabid animal); rabies is fatal if the virus reaches the brain

examples: hell hath no fury like a woman scorned
his face turned red with rage

definitions.text: the quality of being rash and foolish
examples: trying to drive through a blizzard is the height of folly
adjusting to an insane society is total foolishness
poetry is a sort of divine madness
